text: Juna mancheharule aphna palanaharako adesala'i palana gare tiniharuka lagi bhalo hunecha, ra juna mancheharule unako adesala'i avahelana gare, yadi uniharuka lagi prthvima raheko sabai thoka ra tyati nai arubha'e pani tyo sabai aphno muktiko sattama dina taiyara hunchan. Tiniharuka lagi narka thegana cha, ra juna jyadai naramro tha'um ho
